column2: It shall be made in writing;
It must be delivered to the secretary to the Commission;
It  should  be  accompanied  by  a  fee  of  one  thousand  and  five  hundred
It must be made within one month from the date on which the decision
of the TAC was notified in writing to the CGIR or the Appellant.
